roles.name: Admin
roles.angularDescription: Admin users have access to all Angular app features, including event management and user administration.

roles.name: Customer - authenticated user
roles.description: Can browse products and manage own orders.
roles.angularDescription: Authenticated customers can browse events and manage their own bookings within the Angular app.

roles.name: Guest - unauthenticated user
roles.description: Can browse products and manage own orders.
roles.angularDescription: Guests can view events and initiate bookings but have limited access in the Angular app.
